page.description: Change the storage type for Grid and UX Components. The storage type can be either JSON or Binary.
page.discussion: UX Components and Grid Components can be saved as formatted JSON or binary. The *[ui:Change Component storage type]* bulk operation allows you to quickly change the storage type for multiple UX or Grid components to *[ui:Formatted JSON]* or *[ui:Binary]*.

section.title: How to Perform a Change Component storage type Bulk Operation

step.description: To perform a *[ui:Change Component storage type]* bulk operation, open the Web Projects Control Panel and select *[ui:Bulk Operations]* > *[ui:Change Component storage type...]* from the *[ui:Edit]* menu:
Select the type of components you would like to update. You can choose *[ui:Grid Components]* or *[ui:UX Components]*.
Select the Components by checking the checkbox next to the filename. You can use the *[ui:Select All]*, *[ui:Un-Select All]* or *[ui:Wildcard Select]* links to select files.
Choose the storage type to use in the *[ui:Save component as:]* dropdown. The component can be stored as one of the following types:

item.name: Formatted JSON
item.description: Component properties will be saved in clear text. This is useful if you are using a source or version control system that supports displaying differences between file versions.

item.name: Binary
item.description: Component is stored as binary. Binary files are smaller than Formatted JSON.

step.description: Click *[ui:OK]* to perform the bulk operation. A notice with a summary of the operation will be shown when the bulk operation completes.
